title: suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for 0utdoors, Ultrasonic Snake Repeller Outdoor, Snake Repellent for Yard Powerful, Snake Away Scare for Outdoors Lawn Garden and Yard
descriptions:
Introducing the suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors - the ultimate solution to keep those slithery creatures away from your yard, garden, and lawn! Using advanced Ultrasonic technology, this snake repeller emits powerful sonic pulses every 30 seconds, covering a vast 7000 sq. ft. area.

Crafted from premium materials, this repellent is built to last with maximum durability. Powered by solar energy, it's not only eco-friendly but also cost-effective. Worried about safety? Don't be! This repellent is safe for children and pets, as it's chemical-free.

But wait, there's more! Not only does it keep snakes at bay, but it also repels other unwanted animals like deers, cats, rabbits, raccoons, and more. With a repellent effectiveness time of 2-4 weeks, you can enjoy a snake-free environment hassle-free.

Easy to install by placing it 2 inches above the soil, simply charge it in the sun for 4-5 hours before use for optimal performance. Say goodbye to snakes and other unwanted critters with the suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors!
